mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (userid, userpw, username, email) VALUES (#{userid},#{userpw},#{username},#{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, updatedate = SYSDATE WHERE userid = #{userid} AND userpw = #{userpw}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member WHERE userid = #{userid} AND userpw = #{userpw}
